com.ruvla.plsos.agg.model.aggctrl.settable

Class Configurator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ruvla.plsos.agg.model.aggctrl.settable.Configurator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultConfigurator

    public abstract class Configurator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Vladislav Class used to control instantiation and implemention interchanging of different components of Plsos system.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • instantiateDBAdapter

        public abstract DBAdapter instantiateDBAdapter()
        Instantiate DBAdapter. DBAdapter - a component used to connect to some data storage.
        Returns:
        adapter that will be used by other components(e.g. saver) to store collected data.

      • instantiateSender

        public abstract Sender instantiateSender(DataManipulator owner,
                                         UploadConfig config)
        Instantiate Sender. Sender is a component that is responsible for transferring collected data over network to the remote server.
        Parameters:
        owner - data manipulator that holds this sender
        config - configuration object used to parameterize future Sender
        Returns:
        a new Sender

      • instantiateDetector

        public Detector instantiateDetector(Aggregator owner,
                                    DetectorConfig config)
        Instantiate a new Detector. Detector - component that is responsible for detecting new edge devices around aggregator device. Detector can parameterized to work in polling mode(with some refresh period after which is scans for discoverable devices) or asynchronous mode(meaning that event model is used here).
        Parameters:
        owner - aggregator that holds the instantiated detector
        config - parameters for this detector.
        Returns:
        new Detector

      • instantiateCollector

        public Collector instantiateCollector(Aggregator owner,
                                      long colid,
                                      EdgeDevice targetDevice)
        Instantiate a new Collector. A Collector can be thought as a thread which performs serial communication operations with edge device. It established connection with an edge device, performs handshake, collects the data and finished the communication.
        Parameters:
        owner - aggregator that holds this collector
        colid - id of new collector
        targetDevice - device the new collector will communicate with
        Returns:
        new Collector

      • instantiateLogger

        public PlsosLogger instantiateLogger()
        Instantiate new Logger. Logger is a component that is used to log all the messages that the Plsos system generates. It works with I/O, creates logs, write to logs, read from logs, close them and handle multiple access to logs.
        Returns:
        a new Logger

      • instantiateAggListener

        public AggListener instantiateAggListener(PlsosLogger logger)
        Instantiate AggListener. AggListener reacts to different events and logs own actions. If the method is not overridden a DefaultLoggingAggListener is returned.
        Parameters:
        logger - logger through which AggListener can log own actions and reactions.
        Returns:
        new AggListener

      • instantiatePreFilter

        public AggFilter instantiatePreFilter()
        Instantiate an AggFilter to filter just collected data. AggFilter is a component which can drop some input data units if they does not meet some conditions. Pre filter is used to filter the data that an Aggregator gets right from a device with the intention not to let the data unit be processed by units that may accidentally save them. If the method is not overridden a DefaultAggDataFilter is returned.
        Returns:
        a new Pre filter

      • instantiatePostFilter

        public AggFilter instantiatePostFilter()
        Instantiate an AggFilter to filter data to be saved. AggFilter is a component which can drop some input data units if they does not meet some conditions. Post filter is used to filter the data that Saver is intending to save. If the method is not overridden a DefaultAggDataFilter is returned.
        Returns:
        a new Post filter

      • instantiateOutputFormatter

        public OutputFormatter instantiateOutputFormatter()
        Instantiate an OutputFormatter OutputFormatter is a component that is responsible for serializing data units that is about to be sent to remote server. If the method is not overridden a DefaultJsonOutputFormatter is returned.
        Returns:
        a new OutputFormatter

      • instantiateManipulator

        public DataManipulator instantiateManipulator(DataManipulatorConfig config)
        Instantiate a new DataManipulator DataManipulator is a component that lets you control collected data extractions from database, uploadings of data to remote servers and similar.
        Parameters:
        config - configuration of DataManipulator. See DataManipulatorConfig for more information
        Returns:
        a new Manipulator

      • instantiatePreProcessor

        public AggProcessor instantiatePreProcessor()
        Instantiate an AggProcessor to transform data to be saved. AggProcessor is a component which can perform some transformations on the input units and return new ones. Such processors can have complex logic of processing units in the opposite of AggFilter. Pre processor is used to process data when it is transmitted from Aggregator to Saver. If the method is not overridden a DefaultProcessor is returned.
        Returns:
        a new AggProcessor

      • instantiatePostProcessor

        public AggProcessor instantiatePostProcessor()
        Instantiate an AggProcessor to transform data to be sent. AggProcessor is a component which can perform some transformations on the input units and return new ones. Such processors can have complex logic of processing units in the opposite of AggFilter. Post processor is used to process data when it is transmitted from Saver to remote server. If the method is not overridden a DefaultProcessor is returned.
        Returns:
        a new AggProcessor

      • instantiateConfigProvider

        public ConfigurationProvider instantiateConfigProvider()
        Instantiate a ConfigurationProvider. ConfigurationProvider is a component which provide other components with global settings. These providers are highly used by constructors of classes in com.ruvla.plsos.agg.model.aggctrl.configurations. Providers allow you to change settings dynamically during runtime and create new components which are differently configured. If the method is not overridden a DefaultProcessor is returned.
        Returns:
        a new AggProcessor
